typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sk_consumerFullName as string,
		sk_consumerFirstName as string,
		sk_consumerLastName as string,
		sk_consumerMidName as string,
		sk_consumerXRef as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT \n       [sk_consumerFullName]\n      ,[sk_consumerFirstName]\n      ,[sk_consumerLastName]\n      ,[sk_consumerMidName]\n      ,[sk_consumerXRef]\nFROM [dbo].[Stg_Claim]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceStgClaim
sourceStgClaim alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> SetupSCDType1
SetupSCDType1 sink(input(
		ClientID as integer,
		ClientFirstname as string,
		ClientMiddlename as string,
		ClientLastName as string,
		ClientFullName as string,
		ClientXRef as string,
		LastModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ClientXRef'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ClientFullName = sk_consumerFullName,
		ClientFirstname = sk_consumerFirstName,
		ClientMiddlename = sk_consumerMidName,
		ClientLastName = sk_consumerLastName,
		ClientXRef = sk_consumerXRef
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkDimClient
